studio.title: Web Development and Design Studio
studio.subTitle: Designing and developing websites for your business involves creating the visual appearance and functionality of your company. This is a crucial component for any business in the digital age, as your website is the business card of your company.

card1.title: Website Development:
card1.subtitle: Professional website development of any complexity for your company.

card2.title: Design:
card2.subtitle: Creating an attractive and impressive interface design, with a special emphasis on the primacy of mobile devices.

card3.title: Custom Development:
card3.subtitle: Creation of unique UX systems, integration of functionality, selection of media elements and their implementation in the project.

card1.title: Modern Design
card1.txt: Our team consists of experienced designers who will create an original and modern design for your website.

card2.title: Responsiveness
card2.txt: All the websites we create will look great on 4K screens, Apple devices, and mobile devices.

card3.title: Speed
card3.txt: Fast websites provide a better user experience, increase the likelihood of completing desired actions, and improve conversion rates.

card4.title: Optimal Technologies
card4.txt: A positive experience with modern technologies directly boosts user loyalty to the company and product.

card5.title: Conversion
card5.txt: Successful conversion leads to increased sales, attracting new customers, and enhancing loyalty.

card6.title: Analytics
card6.txt: Using analytical tools allows for tracking visitor behavior and analyzing data.

card1.title: Client Needs and Requirements Analysis
card1.txt: At this initial stage, the team communicates with the client to gather information about the business, target audience, and expectations. This helps understand the main priorities and form a clear task for further work.

card2.title: Project Planning
card2.txt: This stage includes drafting a contract that defines the terms of cooperation. Simultaneously, an advance payment is made, and a website concept is created, covering the overall structure and functionality of the future site.

card3.title: Design Creation
card3.txt: This involves determining the placement of elements, color palette, fonts, and other important details. Following this, the design concept is developed, including the creation of prototypes and detailed resolution of all aspects of the web interface.

card4.title: Development and Configuration
card4.txt: At this stage, the technical implementation of the project occurs. The team creates a functional and reliable site, ensuring compliance with all development standards and optimal performance and security.

card5.title: Testing, Optimization & Edits
card5.txt: This stage includes testing on various devices and browsers, optimizing page load speed and SEO parameters. Additionally, any necessary edits and corrections are made. Payment is completed at this stage.

card6.title: Launch & Support
card6.txt: The final stage, where the site is launched and full technical support is provided. The team assists in resolving any technical issues, ensuring the stable and successful operation of the site online.

policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.subtitle: Our Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide when using our services.

box1.title: Information Collection and Use
box1.subtitle: We may collect various types of information, including personal data such as your name, email address, phone number, etc. When you use our services, this information is used solely for processing orders, communicating with you, and providing you with better service.

box2.title: Information Protection
box2.subtitle: We place a high priority on protecting your information and take all possible measures to ensure its security. We do not disclose your personal data to third parties without your consent, except in cases required by law.

box3.title: Control Over Your Information
box3.subtitle: You have the right to modify, delete, or update the information you provide to us at any time. If you have any requests regarding your personal information or our privacy policy, please contact us.

box4.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
box4.subtitle: We may periodically update this privacy policy, and any changes will be posted on our website. By continuing to use our services after changes have been made, you agree to the updated version of the privacy policy.

policy.label: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our privacy policy, please contact us.

cookiesPage.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPage.subtitle: Our Cookie Policy describes how we use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website.

box1.title: What Are Cookies?
box1.subtitle: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit websites. They help the website remember information about your visit, which can make your next visit easier and the site more useful to you.

box2.title: How Do We Use Cookies?
box2.subtitle: We use cookies for various purposes, including:
box2.txt1: Ensuring the proper functioning of our website;
box2.txt3: Analyzing traffic and improving site performance;

box3.title: Control Over Cookies
box3.subtitle: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. You can delete all cookies already on your device and set your browser to prevent new cookies from being saved. Please note that if you disable cookies, some features of our site may not function properly.

box4.title: Changes to the Cookie Policy
box4.subtitle: We may periodically update this cookie policy, and any changes will be posted on our website. By continuing to use our site after changes have been made, you agree to the updated version of the cookie policy.

cookiesPage.label: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our cookie policy, please contact us.
